https://tmrev.io/movie/26821-American Folk-Blues Festival: The Blues and Gospel Train 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A 16 minute short comprising 2 acts of a 1964 event where an innovative group of musicians performed on a real railroad track. The audience on one side of the tracks and the musicians on the station side. American Folk-Blues Festival: The Blues and Gospel Train
